title: Reactions to AP Preseason Poll
description:
Jason Fitz, Tom Luginbill, and Sam Acho react to the release of the first AP Poll of the 2022 season, give their over and under ranked teams entering this fall, and discuss what team currently on the outside of the rankings could make a splash in 2022. Plus, Tom and Sam put together their college football fantasy teams and debate whether preseason polls are harmful or helpful.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew discusses the AP Preseason Poll release
